settings.title: Douglas Pereira Cosmeceuticals
settings.text:
Douglas Pereira Cosmeceuticals is a skincare
brand that strive to boldly transcend the traditional realms of the skincare
Industery, by not getting caught up in the latest fads and trends, but instead,
we formulate skincare products that improve the health of skin cells,
optimising their function, protects the skins barrier and counteract the
effects that pollution, stress and ageing has on the skin.

 

If we were to define the philosophy behind ‘Douglas
Pereira Cosmeceuticals’ in a few words, it would be. ‘We take a holistic
approach alongside scientifically – innovative formulations, that work in
conjunction with your skin’s biology.’

 

Our formulations are skin identical, work
deeply through the multiple layers of the skin, relate and have relevance to
each of the key skin function and the way they perform. By formulating products
that work with your skins biology we can achieve effective visible, long-term
results that will transform the health of your skin.

 

We know choosing the correct products for your skin, budget and
lifestyle can be challenging. So, under the Douglas
Pereira Cosmeceuticals brand we have developed two skincare collections. ‘Douglas
Pereira Skin Health,’ a premium prescriptive collection of advanced products for
a skin savvy user and ‘Douglas Pereira Skin Science,’ an uncomplicated skincare
collection, with complex formulations’ for those looking for a simple routine. Both
ranges uphold our brand philosophy but have their own unique identity and concept.

settings.title: Douglas Pereira Skin Health Collection
settings.text:
Douglas Pereira Skin Health is a premium collection of result driven products that have been formulated for a skincare savvy user or somebody that wants to elevate their skincare regime and achieve
effective, visible, long-term results that will transform their skins health.
We believe your skincare regime should be as individual as you are.

settings.title: Douglas Pereira Skin science Collection
settings.text:
Douglas Pereira Skin Science is an
uncomplicated skincare collection, with complex formulations, for everyday people.

This collection is a straightforward range of products that has been developed to suit all skin types, with our universal formulations and offers simple skincare solutions for those not wanting a complicated homecare regime, but still striving for result driven skincare without too many steps.
